#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int a,b,c,t,n;
	scanf("%d",&n);
	while(n--){
		scanf("%d",&a);
		scanf("%d",&b);
		scanf("%d",&c);
		t = 0;
		if((a > b)&&(a < c) || (a > c) && (a < b) ){
			t = a;
		}
		else if((b > a)&&(b < c) || (b > c) && (b < a)){
			t = b;
		}
		else if(a == b) {
			t = b;
		}
		else {
			t = c;
		}		
	printf("%d",t);
	printf("\n");	
			
	}
	return 0;
}
